slides.content:
# F3 - Financial Strategy

F3 covers **corporate finance** and **strategic decisions**.

## What You Will Learn

- **Formulation** - Financial strategy
- **Financing** - Sources and structure
- **Investment** - Valuations
- **Treasury** - Risk management

## Syllabus Areas

| Area | Weight |
|------|--------|
| Financial strategy | 25% |
| Financing decisions | 25% |
| Investment decisions | 25% |
| Treasury | 25% |

slides.title: Financial Strategy
slides.content:
# Strategic Finance

## Objectives

| Objective | Focus |
|-----------|-------|
| Shareholder value | Maximize |
| Profitability | Returns |
| Liquidity | Cash |
| Growth | Expansion |

## Financial Planning

```
Strategic plan
-> Financial implications
-> Funding requirements
-> Financial strategy
```

## Value Creation

```
Return > Cost of Capital
= Value creation
```

slides.title: Cost of Capital
slides.content:
# WACC

## Formula

```
WACC = (E/V x Ke) + (D/V x Kd x (1-T))
```

## Cost of Equity (CAPM)

```
Ke = Rf + beta(Rm - Rf)

beta = Systematic risk
```

## Cost of Debt

```
Kd = Pre-tax cost x (1 - Tax)

or IRR of bond payments
```

slides.title: DCF Valuation
slides.content:
# Discounted Cash Flow

## Entity Value

```
Entity Value = Sum of [FCF / (1+WACC)^n]
               + Terminal Value

Equity Value = Entity Value - Debt
```

## Terminal Value

```
TV = FCF(1+g) / (WACC - g)

g = Growth rate
```

## Free Cash Flow

```
EBIT x (1-T)
+ Depreciation
- Capex
- Working capital increase
= FCF
```
